TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 从 Microsoft Ajax 角色服务中获取基于 Windows 的应用程序的角色信息。

span.span: Gets role information for Windows-based applications from an Microsoft Ajax roles service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将应用程序配置为使用类, 可以使用客户端应用程序服务从现有角色服务中检索角色信息。You can use client application services to retrieve role information from an existing roles service by configuring your application to use the class. 配置后, 可以通过调用属性返回`static`的的方法来确定经过身份验证的用户是否属于特定角色。After configuration, you can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the method of the returned by the `static` property. 对于配置为使用客户端应用程序服务的应用程序，此属性会返回 。For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a . 因为此类实现 接口，所以无需显式引用它。Because this class implements the interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly. 方法在内部调用方法。 The method internally calls the method. 类是一个只读角色成员资格提供程序, 它从属性指示的角色服务中检索经过身份验证的用户的角色信息。 The class is a read-only role membership provider that retrieves role information for authenticated users from the roles service indicated by the property. 通常, 从应用程序配置文件和其他配置值检索属性的值。The value of the property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 您可以 `static` 通过属性检索当前实例。You can retrieve the current instance through the `static` property. 类仅支持抽象类的 和方法。 The class supports only the and methods of the abstract class. 为特定用户调用这些方法之一时, 服务提供程序将首先检查本地数据缓存中的角色信息。When you call one of these methods for a particular user, the service provider first checks the local data cache for role information. 如果缓存不包含任何角色信息或缓存已过期, 则服务提供程序将从角色服务中检索角色信息, 并将其添加到缓存中。If the cache does not contain any role information or the cache has expired, the service provider retrieves the role information from the roles service and adds it to the cache. 在配置客户端应用程序服务时, 可以为角色缓存指定超时期限。You can specify the time-out period for the roles cache when you configure client application services. 若要强制方法从服务而不是本地缓存中检索角色数据, 请先调用方法。To force the method to retrieve role data from the service instead of the local cache, call the method first. 不能使用类创建或删除角色, 或修改用户的角色成员身份。You cannot use the class to create or delete roles, or to modify the role membership of users. 若要创建或修改角色信息, 必须更改服务器上的角色服务配置。To create or modify role information, you must change the configuration of the role service on the server. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置角色服务位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the roles service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#302)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#302)]

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务

MemberSignature.Value: public override string[] GetRolesForUser (string username);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string[] GetRolesForUser(string username) cil managed

param.name: username
param.span: 要检索其角色的用户的名称。

span.span: The name of the user to retrieve roles for.

summary.span: 获取指定用户所属的角色的名称。

span.span: Gets the names of the roles that the specified user belongs to.

returns.span: 所属的角色名称；如果用户未通过身份验证，则为一个空数组。

span.span: The role names that belongs to or an empty array if the user is not authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索当前经过身份验证的用户的角色信息, 必须`username`在参数中指定该信息。 The method retrieves role information for the current, authenticated user, which you must specify in the `username` parameter. 可以通过`static` 属性获取用户名称, 如下所示: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`。You can get the user name through the `static` property as follows: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`. 服务提供程序会缓存有关本地文件系统的角色信息, 以避免不必要的服务调用。The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls. 有关详细信息, 请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法在测试角色成员资格之前确定用户登录名是否已过期。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to determine whether the user login has expired before testing role membership. 此代码假定所有有效用户都与一个或多个角色关联。This code assumes that all valid users are associated with one or more roles. 在这种情况下 , 该方法将不会为其登录名已过期的以前经过身份验证的用户返回任何角色。In this case, the method will not return any roles for a previously-authenticated user whose login has expired. 如果用户登录名已过期, 则此代码将显示登录对话框。If the user login has expired, this code displays the login dialog box. 否则, 它会调用方法来确定用户是否为 "经理" 角色。Otherwise, it calls the method to determine whether the user is in the "manager" role. 受限代码位于`PerformManagerTask`方法中, 但未提供此方法。The restricted code is in a `PerformManagerTask` method, which is not provided. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#321)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#321)]

exception.span: 不是当前通过身份验证的用户的用户名。

span.span: is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.

span.span: The friendly name of the provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 名称/值对的集合，表示在配置中为该提供程序指定的、特定于提供程序的特性。

span.span: A collection of name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展性模型调用方法以使用应用程序配置文件中的信息初始化。 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the using information in your application configuration file. 此方法可识别以下角色服务配置特性:This method recognizes the following role service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `cacheTimeout` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` - `honorCookieExpiry` 有关这些属性的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

exception.span: 包含的 cacheTimeout 值格式不正确，无法转换为 值。

span.span: contains a cacheTimeout value that is not in the correct format for conversion to an value.

exception.span: 包含的 cacheTimeout 值用于表示小于 或大于 的数。

span.span: contains a cacheTimeout value that represents a number less than or greater than .

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务

summary.span: 获取一个指示指定用户是否属于指定角色的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role.

returns.span: 如果指定用户处于指定的角色，则为 ；如果指定用户未通过身份验证或者不处于指定的角色，则为 。

span.span: if the specified user is in the specified role; if the specified user is not authenticated or is not in the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过调用 属性返回`static`的的方法来确定经过身份验证的用户是否属于特定角色。You can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the method of the returned by the `static` property. 对于配置为使用客户端应用程序服务的应用程序，此属性会返回 。For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a . 因为此类实现 接口，所以无需显式引用它。Because this class implements the interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly. 方法在内部调用方法。 The method internally calls the method. 方法使用方法来确定由指示`username`的用户是否在由指示`roleName`的角色中。 The method uses the method to determine whether the user indicated by `username` is in the role indicated by `roleName`. 服务提供程序会缓存有关本地文件系统的角色信息, 以避免不必要的服务调用。The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls. 有关详细信息, 请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何直接访问此方法, 以确定用户是否属于特定角色。The following example code demonstrates how to access this method directly to determine whether the user is in a particular role. 此代码首先测试用户登录名是否已过期。This code first tests whether the user login has expired. 需要显式引用才能调用方法, 因此使用相同的引用来调用方法。An explicit reference is required to call the method, so the same reference is used to call the method. 如果用户为 "经理" 角色, 则此代码将调用`PerformManagerTask`未提供的方法。If the user is in the "manager" role, this code calls a `PerformManagerTask` method, which is not provided. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#321)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#321)]

exception.span: 不是当前通过身份验证的用户的用户名。

span.span: is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.

exception.span: 用户不再是通过身份验证的用户。

span.span: The user is no longer authenticated.
The roles service is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResetCache ();
.method public hidebysig instance void ResetCache() cil managed
Public Sub ResetCache ()
public: void ResetCache();
member this.ResetCache : unit -> unit

summary.span: 清除缓存的角色信息并重置缓存的超时期限。

span.span: Clears the cached role information and resets the cache time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从本地缓存中移除所有角色信息, 并导致缓存过期。The method removes all role information from the local cache and causes the cache to expire. 调用此方法后, 下一次调用或方法将从配置的角色服务而不是本地缓存中检索角色信息。After you call this method, your next call to the or method will retrieve role information from the configured role service instead of the local cache. 您可以使用此方法来使用户能够在角色发生更改但缓存尚未过期时刷新角色缓存。You can use this method to enable users to refresh the roles cache when their role has changed but the cache has not yet expired. 有关如何设置角色缓存超时间隔的信息, 请参阅[如何:配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For information about how to set the roles cache time-out interval, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法重置本地角色缓存。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to reset the local roles cache. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#314](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#314)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#314](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#314)]

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务

span.span: How to: Configure Client Application Services

MemberSignature.Value: public string ServiceUri { get; set; }
.property instance string ServiceUri
Public Property ServiceUri As String
public: property System::String ^ ServiceUri { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ServiceUri : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置角色服务的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the role service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在应用程序代码中设置属性, 但通常会在应用程序配置文件中设置该值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 这样, 便可以在不重新编译代码的情况下更改服务位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 以编程方式设置服务位置时, 必须指定完整的服务 URI, 该 URI 将始终以 "Role_JSON_AppService" 结尾。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Role_JSON_AppService.axd". ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置角色服务位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the roles service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#302)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#302)]

exception.span: 获取此属性时，未在应用程序配置文件中发现任何服务 URI，并且以前未设置过此属性。

span.span: When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务
